prompt_base: intelligent young woman, captivating blue eyes, long smooth turquoise teal hair, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, laboratory lighting
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, individual hair strands, natural fabric textures, subtle reflections on hair, sharp focus, subsurface scattering
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, bad hair, unrealistic hair color, messy hair, low quality, blurry clothes, dull colors, (wig:1.2)
